Twitter announced a new functionnality : the « Hovercards ». 

<p>
  <span style="font-size: x-small; font-family: Arial;"><span style="font-size: 10.0pt; font-family: Arial;">Basically, on twitter.com, when you hover over a username or avatar; the cards will display information about that person and allow you to interact.</span></span>
</p>
